content: It is difficult to accurately predict the chances of two kickoff returns occurring in a specific NFL game, as there are many variables at play. The strength of the two teams and the specific players involved can certainly affect the likelihood of a kickoff return occurring, but there are many other factors that can also come into play, such as the weather conditions, the field conditions, and the strategy of the two teams. That being said, the Buffalo Bills and the New England Patriots are both strong teams with talented players, so it is certainly possible that one or both of them could have a successful kickoff return in their upcoming game.
